question:
Consider the following statements about Inter-cropping:
  1. Growing of two or more than two crops simultaneously on the same piece of land is called inter-cropping
  2. It is mostly prevalent in plantation crops like coconut and areca nut
  3. It yields higher productivity per unit area
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
Growing of two or more than two crops simultaneously on the same piece of land is called inter-cropping. It yields higher productivity per unit area. It is mostly prevalent in plantation crops like coconut and areca nut. Main objectives of intercropping are:
  • Insurance against total crop failure under aberrant weather conditions or pest epidemics
  • Increase in total productivity per unit land area
  • Judicious utilization of resources such as land, labor and inputs
